perturbation.original_text:
5.01     TERM.  The  term  ("Term")  of  this Agreement shall be for one hundred
eighty  days  (180)  from  the  date set forth below unless Network 1 or Visa or
MasterCard  or Harris Bank doesn't approve Affiliate's ISO application, in which
case,  the  Term  will  be  3 years. This Agreement will automatically renew for
successive  one-year  terms  unless  terminated by either party by providing the
other  with  30  days  written notice that this Agreement will not be renewed or
Affiliate  enters  into  a  Processing  agreement  with  Network  1  and  an ISO
Sponsorship  agreement  with  Harris  Bank  in  which  case  this Agreement will
automatically  terminate  concurrent  with  the  execution  of  such agreements.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.01     TERM.  The  term  ("Term")  of  this Agreement shall be for one hundred
eighty  days  (180)  from  the  date set forth below unless Network 1 or Visa or
MasterCard  or Harris Bank doesn't approve Affiliate's ISO application, in which
case,  the  Term  will  be  3 years. This Agreement will automatically renew for
successive  one-year  terms  unless  terminated by either party by providing the
other  with  7  days  written notice that this Agreement will not be renewed or
Affiliate  enters  into  a  Processing  agreement  with  Network  1  and  an ISO
Sponsorship  agreement  with  Harris  Bank  in  which  case  this Agreement will
automatically  terminate  concurrent  with  the  execution  of  such agreements.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the written notice period for non-renewal from 30 days to 7 days creates a legal contradiction. Many jurisdictions, including some states within the US and general contract law principles, require a reasonable notice period for contract termination or non-renewal, especially in agreements involving ongoing business relationships. A 7-day notice may be deemed unreasonable and therefore unenforceable, depending on the specific circumstances and the jurisdiction's legal standards.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles regarding 'reasonable notice' and potential state laws requiring longer notification periods for contract non-renewal.
